author: brane
msg: semicolon to the right place to silence the compiler.

author: kfogel
msg: expansion test data, but don't modify the tests or verifiers to use it
yet.  Protect the test data from expansion by using C's constant
string concatenation feature.  Just for the record: I actually went as
far as inventing new $Stop$ and $Resume$ keywords in svn_types.h, and
surrounding the test data with them, before remembering I could just
do constant concatenation in the source code.  Live and learn, relive
